1.0.name: wordpress/block-comment
1.0.description: In current system in wordpress user that type is contributor can write comment.But if site admin want to block witting comment for contributor it possible by activate block-comment plugin. For more information about the plugin please see: http://www.krishe.com/en/block-comment
